message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I proposed first.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think a more even split is in order. Let's try 525/475, since I'm making the offer now.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This is a slight improvement on my previous offer.
Alice, I'm willing to budge a bit further to get this done.  Let's go with 512.5/487.5, reflecting the slight shift in my favor due to the offer cycle.
Bob, we're losing money with each round! This is a compromise - halfway between our last offers. Let's settle this before the losses get even bigger.
Alice, we're both losing money here. It's time to be realistic. Let's split the difference from our last offers - 506.25/493.75.  We can't keep dragging this out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  We're both losing out. I propose a perfectly even split.  Take it or leave it - it's my final offer.
